author: Reuters Editorial
title: Britain rules out any form of customs union with the EU after Brexit - BBC
text:
LONDON, Feb 5 (Reuters) - Britain has ruled out any form of customs union with the European Union after Brexit, the BBC reported, citing a source in Prime Minister Theresa May’s Downing Street office.
May’s office declined to comment on the report.
“It is not our policy to be in the customs union,” the Guardian newspaper Quote: d an unidentified Downing Street source as saying. “It is not our policy to be in a customs union.” (Reporting by Guy Faulconbridge; editing by Michael Holden)
